about_the_game:
Welcome to Virtual Cottage 2!

Virtual Cottage 2 is your quiet space in a world that tries to distract you at every opportunity. Start it up, enter what you want done, and get in the flow while listening to some nice chill beats and ambient sounds.

Customize your cottage, focus on your daily tasks, and even get rewarded with new furniture for your dedication.

Focus tools

⏰ The Classic Timer: Create a task, set your time, and let it count down.
🍅 Pomodoro timer: Set your intervals and breaks to suit your needs.
⏱️ Stopwatch: A simple timer to track the time spent on a task.
📜 To-Do-List: Create tasks, categories, or even recurring routines.

🎨Customize your cottage📐

  • A wide variety of furniture:
    Virtual Cottage 2 has many different furniture items you can place inside your home. Create your very own space that makes you feel comfortable. By studying, you get rewarded with a new item daily to individualize your home even more!

  • Different cottages:
    Select the New Cottage Layout, The Apartment, or the Classic Cottage. We plan to add even more cottage layouts in the future.
  • Pets: You’ll be able to have a cat, dog, and a bird in your cottage - simultaneously!

🎵Relaxing Atmosphere (Sound & Music)⛈️

  • Virtual Cottage 2 has various ambient sounds, like a soft breeze or gentle rainfall. Mix and match these sounds to your liking to create the perfect study atmosphere.
  • While the game comes with Lo-Fi beats to listen to, you can also load in your own music!

Also: If you supported us by buying the Dreeme and LØNÆR Music DLCs for Virtual Cottage 1 (THANK YOU SO MUCH!) don’t worry. They will automatically carry over to Virtual Cottage 2!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (or Higher)
  • Processor: Dual-core from Intel or AMD at 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Videocard with at least 512MB
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
